name: Healthier Hot Artichoke and Spinach Dip II
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: This healthier dip recipe is as amazing as Tiffany's original recipe.  Its creamy texture goes great with crispy toasted multi-grain bread or crackers.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a small baking dish
Mix together Neufchatel cheese, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, Romano cheese, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Gently stir in artichoke hearts and spinach
Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until bubbly and lightly browned, about 25 minutes
